divs: sighting detailsquestion 1: i was driving home at around 3:45pm 2: i glanced at some railroad tracks, when the glow caught my eye. 3: it might have been a meteor\meteorite 4: from where i was it was a centimeter long moving at about 1cm per 1sec. it had a greenish blue glow and was elliptical. i thought it was tumbling but wasn't sure. 5: mostly "what the hell was that?" type feeling. 6: went behind trees. i am attaching a general area\direction of where it was and what it looked like.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Windham
There were no other sightings in Windham on or around December 10th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
